title: Situationship at the Office
itunes:title: Situationship at the Office
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, My co-worker and I have developed feelings for each other. The problem is, he is already in a situationship with another co-worker. They've been together for more than four years and he says they're not sexually involved, but they spend a lot of time with each other...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
